name: ModernSlang
0:
”Alexa, open Modern Slang”
”Alexa, launch Modern Slang”
”Alexa, start Modern Slang”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: modern slang
des:
You often hear people using slang words, but do not know what is the meaning of them? You don't want to ask the meaning of slang words? Modern Slang will help you to learn the most popular slang words and what do they mean.

Modern Slang is a cool way to stay in the tune with modern language.
